subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Rafael Márquez is the first player in World Cup history to have worn a captain’s armband at four straight tournaments, a giant achievement given how unlikely it seemed just a short while ago.
snippet: Rafael Márquez is the first player in World Cup history to have worn a captain’s armband at four straight tournaments, a giant achievement given how unlikely it seemed just a short while ago.
